video.title: La Promesa
video.synopsis: Deceived by promises of a better life, three young women are sold into prostitution and must risk their lives and those of their families to escape.

episodes.synopsis: At a big party, Ana, Frida, and Seleni, victims of human trafficking, escape from their captors, who chase them through the streets of Toledo.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Rosaura loses Frida’s birth certificate and Chuahtémoc blackmails her, saying she’ll tell her husband about her lover. Crisanto tries to rape Ana.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Seleni isn’t sure about Yorlis’s offer, but Manuela persuades her to accept. Alirio gives Ana the tickets to Spain and says she can’t bring the boy.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Melissa tells Roberto she has a date with the Gringo, and he warns her to be careful. Roberto asks Lucía to let him go out and help Melissa.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Vicente intercepts Frida and brings her back to the ranch for questioning, but Frida doesn’t respond. Vicente decides to cancel the trip to Acapulco.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Roberto is still trying to track Melissa down, but the lieutenant warns him to watch it, because his behavior could affect the whole mission.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Frida goes to the airport and borrows the taxi driver’s phone to call Juan Lucas and tell him she’s going on a trip. He says someone will pick her up.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Roberto is on Melissa’s trail, but he can’t track her down. Juan Lucas invites Frida to dinner. Vicente calls Juan Lucas and asks for his wife.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Ana is suspicious of Yorlis. Hamilton finds some men harassing the girls and scares them off with a gun. Yorlis and Hamilton get in an accident.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca goes to Panama as a surprise, but her husband’s not listed at the hotel he said he was staying at. Seleni and the girls get lost in the jungle.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Frida feels like she’s living the best moments of her life with Juan Lucas. Rebeca searches for her husband who isn’t answering his cell phone.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Ana and the other girls walking with Hamilton through the jungle realize that Marcela is dead. Ana is attended at the clinic and put on bed rest.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca arrives at the airport while Juan Carlos asks Orlando to distract Frida and keep her from leaving. Juan Lucas asks Rebeca to give him a chance.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Frida goes into the warehouse and finds other girls who’ve been recruited and realizes she’s fallen for a trap. Juan Lucas tells them he owns them.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Juan Lucas asks Rebeca to accompany him to see a customer, but she refuses. Tania tells the girls she’s going to train them to work as prostitutes.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Frida is in bad shape after Yorlis beats her. Tania teaches them to put on makeup and takes them to dance for the customers. Karen and Britani dance.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Yorlis catches Frida trying to escape in a taxi and Hamilton beats her. Some gang members defend the girls, but Frida says she fights her own battles.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Seleni has a plan to save everyone: threaten to kill a stewardess and make them land the plane in Colombia. Frida is having symptoms of pregnancy.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: In Panama, the girls realize their trip won’t be by plane but by boat. Juan Lucas says goodbye to the girls and Yorlis forces them onto the boat.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: In the bathroom, Frida slits her wrists, and Seleni manages to kick the door in. The girls are worried about Frida. Juan Lucas reminisces about her.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Antonio, a member of the ship’s crew, makes a deal with Yorlis to give him and another man some time with two of the girls. Valeria convinces Rebeca.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: From Melissa’s cell phone, Lucía discovers that the last calls were made to Roberto and Hamilton, as well as the address where the calls were made.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: In Mexico, Vicente finds out Frida isn’t Rosaura’s daughter and Facundo is dead. He goes to Bogotá and asks the police to investigate Frida’s case.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Hamilton tries to alert Juan Lucas, but a policeman interrupts him to check his papers. Juan Lucas calls Fermín to relay the situation on the boat.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Vicente suspects that Frida was kidnapped, having received a warning note. Vicente tells Lucía that he suspects his wife has been kidnapped.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: The girls prepare for the Platinum Night Club opening. When Frida refuses to take off her blouse for Hamilton, Juan takes it, revealing her stomach.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Roberto tells Lucía that the Colonel refused to give his approval and asks her to let him talk to Olga alone. Olga feels guilty for Ana’s situation.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Seleni goes into the bathroom and sees a chance to escape through the air ducts. The other girls a worried when they realize the condition Ana is in.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Fermín apologizes to Indira and she tells him to trust her. Fermín asks Juan Lucas to get the girls he needs from another supplier.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Lucía stops Roberto from killing himself, and Sofía says to leave. Lucía warns the Colonel that the alert is out and asks him to speed things up.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: In Colombia, Yorlis meets with Manuela not knowing she’s being watched and gives her half the money, threatening her to disappear or he’ll kill her.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Alirio arrives at home and finds Crisanto and Mirta making love. He pulls a gun to shoot Crisanto, but he grabs it, and the gun goes off.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Alirio lies wounded, shot by Crisanto. Mirta is about to call an ambulance, but he stops her. As Alirio dies, Mirta says they have to call the police.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Crisanto buries Alirio as Mirta weeps for him. He says he’ll get some money so they can leave. Crisanto asks Olga about a lawyer to get Pedrito back.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Roberto gives Lucía the details of Seleni’s call. Olga talks with the attorney about Pedrito’s kidnappers and he asks for $25 million to proceed.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Frida and Seleni return to the club. Hamilton tells Frida they’re planning their escape. Fermín warns Seleni and Frida not to try to escape again.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Frida and Seleni are locked up. Hamilton brings them some food and Frida asks him to get them out of there, but Hamilton says it’s not up to him.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Hamilton and Frida walk the streets of Toledo because Frida has to work. Hamilton says he’s not going to let her work and they’ll get the money.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Fermín is informed Javier and Ana are missing. He asks the police to help him find them. Hamilton takes the girls out. Seleni tells Helena Ana is OK.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Hamilton talks with Frida and tries to win her trust. He tells her about her mother and says he wants to help her. Indira tries to calm Fermín down.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Seleni is very worried about the auction. Fermín talks with the auctioneers and explains how to bid. Seleni argues with Indira before the auction.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Fermín finds out Ana’s been recaptured. The police catch him in a parking lot. They try to run and a firefight breaks out. Fermín escapes with Seleni.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Indira tries to leave the house, but Fermín’s men won’t let her. When she returns to the club, she tells Carmen things are out of control without her.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Indira talks with Helena and tells her she’s the one who asked Fermín to lift her punishment. Indira asks where the girls are, but she ignores her.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Roberto and Lucía ask Mirta a few questions as she seems to be losing it. Doña Sofía tells Yeison Luz Myriam called her and said he was with Seleni.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: The fire in the warehouse leaves a pile of bodies. Lucía finds out that the warehouse that burned down was in Rebeca’s name. The truth comes to light.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Crisanto is tired of working for Pedrito. At the DA’s office, Lucía wants Juan Lucas to come out of hiding, asking Rebeca to call him asking for help.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: With some joking and some flattery, the minister gets Seleni to feel a little more comfortable. Rebeca gets Manu to tell her all about the business.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Juan Lucas and Yorlis’s search for Raquel Suárez leads them to Spain. Hamilton finds out Raquel has been sold to either the Yakuza or the Arabs.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Valeria follows Dani, who leads her to Juan Lucas, and she is confused to hear that her father is a criminal and her boyfriend is a liar.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Fermín tells Hamilton to get the Colombian girls ready because he thinks it’s time to leave Madrid. Elber is arrested as undocumented for deportation.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Juan Lucas answers the phone and Yorlis tells him it’s a trap. Yorlis helps him from his position by starting a firefight to distract the police.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: When Indira fails to cooperate, the police say they’re proceeding with her deportation. She manages to reach Alexei and asks him to get Seleni out.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Juan Lucas’s lawyer visits Yorlis to say he’s not getting out anytime soon and offers a reward for his silence. Elber calls Javier asking for Ana.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Luz Miriam tells Roberto and Lucía about her past, how Fermín fooled her by faking Seleni’s death and how she tried to save her long-lost daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: After testifying, the girls start having doubts about going back to Colombia, fearing their loved ones will judge them. Juan Lucas is locked up.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: In Colombia, the Colonel tells Luz Miriam she’s going to be extradited and arrests her. The Colonel agrees to let her see her daughter under watch.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Roberto helps Vicente humiliate Juan Lucas. Vicente asks Roberto to be his son’s godfather. Olga knows the truth about Seleni’s mother.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Roberto kicks Luz Miriam out of the house for helping sell Seleni to the man who raped her. Ana is worried Seleni will never forgive her for this.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Two years later, everyone meets at Seleni’s graduation party. Ana is pregnant, and little by little they’ve gotten over their misfortune.
episodes.title: Episode 60
